ActPest Control Products Act
Financial Administration Act
SubjectPest Control Products Fees and Charges Regulations
PrecisPEST CONTROL PRODUCTS FEES AND CHARGES REGULATIONS in order to update (1) application fees to better reflect Health Canadaâ€™s current costs to conduct pre-market science-based review of applications to register pest control products; and (2) the annual charge applied to each registered pest control product to help defray the costs of conducting post-market regulatory activities.
